title: Find General Formula
text: The first step is to identify what general formula can be used for direct variaition with a square and inverse variation with a cube.

title: Solve for Constant
text: Given $$y=2$$, $$x=6$$, and $$z=8$$, solve for the constant k by plugging those values in.

title: Find Specific Formula
text: Use the constant to write an equation that represents the relationship.

title: Using Subsitution
text: Plug in $$y=1$$ and $$z=27$$ to solve for $$x$$.
